articles.description: Would you rather have your DNA in deep space or have a traditional funeral service?
articles.content:
(NewsNation) Would you rather have your DNA in orbit or have a traditional funeral service?
So-called “space burials” consist of launching cremated remains or DNA into space. While they’re not an en… [+1531 chars]
